metadata.synopsis: Vignette: Sobering Up one-liners. Distracted and annoyed guard who is trying to deal with his drunk friend.

0.speaker: Cashguard Gurira
0.text: Suppose I'll have to add 'babysitting drunks' to my employment experience. 'Go work for a bank' they said, 'It'll be prestigious' they said...

1.speaker: Cashguard Gurira
1.text: I'm off the clock, dokal - or I would be if it weren't for this blithering idiot. If you've got business at the Counting House, it's just down the road.
1.context:
NodeContext: dokaal - DO-khal (like a throat clear at the end) - meaning two-legger (aka humanoid) 
'this blithering idiot' refers to the colleague who's had too much to drink
